WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I am working on a Report Services project and I just need to be able to check if a directory (based on user and it’s LDAP group) exist or not.  I have used T-SQL, used VB.NET code inside report properties and also used C# class library and none worked.
 
All will return 0 or false.  I will be happy to provide code for each one of these if needed.  
 
Any help greatly appreciated
 
Thank you
WorkItem.Summary: Using SQL Server Reporting Services how to check if a directory exist on the network

Comments.Message:
Problem has been solved, please check the link
http://www.bidn.com/forums/microsoft-business-intelligence/reporting-services/371/check-for-a-directory-using-report-services-c-vb-net-or-t-sql-need-help#1530

Thanks
